nycTheatreExcerpt: "This is not a dark Brechtian take on a well-known musical, nor a queer reclamation of mainstream pop culturebut I'm not sure anyone needs that from Mamma Mia!, a show that knows what it is and consistently delivers. When confronted with such a chronically enjoyable juggernaut, one can only say, "Thank you for the music."
